scripts.desktop: npm run bdd:gen && cross-env ENV_PLATFORM=desktop npx playwright test --project=desktop --grep-invert @mobileOnly
scripts.desktop:ui: npm run bdd:gen && cross-env ENV_PLATFORM=desktop npx playwright test --project=desktop --ui --grep-invert @mobileOnly
scripts.mobile: npm run bdd:gen && cross-env ENV_PLATFORM=mobile npx playwright test --project=mobile --grep-invert @desktopOnly
scripts.mobile:ui: npm run bdd:gen && cross-env ENV_PLATFORM=mobile npx playwright test --project=mobile --ui --grep-invert @desktopOnly
scripts.only: npm run bdd:gen && npx playwright test --project=desktop --grep @onlyThis
